if you know what’s good for you.word: if you know what’s good for you
if you know what’s good for you.translat: used in a threatening way to tell someone to do something or something bad will happen to them
Do as he says, if you know what’s good for you!
used to tell someone that they should do something, or something bad will happen
You’ll keep your mouth shut about this if you know what’s good for you!
